metadata.Title: CVE-2021-46195 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: GCC v12.0 was discovered to contain an uncontrolled recursion via thecomponent libiberty/rust-demangle.c. This vulnerability allows attackers tocause a Denial of Service (DoS) by consuming excessive CPU and memoryresources.

criterions.comment: gcc-3.3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
